about.title: ABOUT PVD
about.subtitle: 20+ Years of Excellence in Resettlement & Livelihood Restoration
about.description: Phornsavarn Development Sole Company Limited (PVD) is a specialized provider of end-to-end management of the entire Resettlement Action Plan (RAP) cycle and Livelihood and Income Restoration Program (LIRP) services, operating under a Lump Sum Turnkey (LSTK) model for major hydropower projects. With over 20 years of experience, including successful project completions like NN2 (1,053 HHs), XHPP (663 HHs) and ongoing LPHPP (1,593 HHs), PVD delivers holistic solutions encompassing the construction of quality housing, essential public infrastructure, community capacity building, and sustainable livelihood programs, with a focus on vulnerable families. We strictly adhere to international standards (e.g., IFC, World Bank Performance Standards) and the relevant policies of the Lao PDR, ensuring ethical and effective project delivery.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To deliver world-class resettlement and livelihood restoration programs that ensure Project-Affected Persons (PAPs) are better off than before project commencement.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the leading company in Lao PDR for environment management and resettlement development, setting the standard for ethical, effective, and sustainable community development.

department.title: Communications & Promotional Support
department.overview: The proposed department is established to provide strategic communications and promotional support across all PVD activities pertaining to our integrated Environmental Management Plan (EMP) and Resettlement Action Plan (RAP) turnkey contracts. Serving as the company's dedicated outreach, communication, and public relations arm, the department ensures the delivery of clear, consistent, and positive messaging to all key stakeholders. Its core mandate involves the comprehensive management of information dissemination, proactive stakeholder engagement, and targeted awareness campaigns.

objectives.title: Department Objectives
items: Develop clear communication materials (brochures, posters, presentations)
Capture and promote success stories, progress photos, and video documentation
Create PVD profiles and the PVD website
Build a positive company image through transparent communication and professional outreach
Strengthen public understanding and support for all project components
Promote sustainable livelihood and social development initiatives
Support the documentation and dissemination of project activities and achievements
Ensure accurate and timely information sharing for all project components
